name: Crystal Battleaxe
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.Antimagic Susceptibility: The battleaxe is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the battleaxe must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.
traits.False Appearance: While the battleaxe remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal battleaxe.

actions.Battleaxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.
